item.title: Key Terms
item.description: Listing of some key terms for me and definitions as I’m working through stuff. Epistomology - the study of the nature of knowledge. How we know things and whre they come from. What knowledge is and where it comes from. Ontology - the study of the nature of things in the world. What is the nature of things. How a thing occurs and it’s relationship to other things. How things and materials operate in the world.
